title: A Grab Bag of Pop Culture Recommendations and Rob Harvilla on the Music of the '90s
description:
Chris and Andy recommend a few shows that they’re liking that are not normal “Watch fare,” including ‘Borgen’ and ‘Call My Agent!’ (7:33). Then, they are joined by Rob Harvilla to talk about his experience with music in the 1990s and how he picked the songs for his new podcast, ‘60 Songs That Explain the ‘90s’ (32:46).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Rob Harvilla
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
